Welcome to this file with a totally unrelated name! It will be harder than the first two, but it can be done!

Clue #3:
The following message was translated into some either Spanish, Latin, Arabic, or Chinese
And then it was translated into binary

01001110 01101111 01101101 01100101 01101110 00100000 01100001 01110101 01110100 01100101 01101101 00100000 01100110 01101001 01101100
01100101 00111010 00100000 01101100 01110101 01110000 01110101 01101101 00100000 01100011 01100001 01110000 01101001 01101100 01101100
01110101 01101101
